title: Consumer Data Right Test Data JSON Schema
description: A JSON schema for defining test data files that can be used to seed a mock, or test, implementation of a Data Holder for the Consumer Data Right

fileVersion.description: The version of the file formatted using semver (without extensions)

standardsVersion.description: The version of the CDR standards that these tests are validated for.  For formatted using semver (without extensions)

title.description: A short title of the test data file

description.description: An optional description of the test data file to identify its purpose

clientCache.description: A cache of previously registered clients

registerCache.description: A cache of previously loaded recipients from the CDR Register

holders.description: An array of holders and their data

holderWrapper.description: A wrapper for a single holder to contain all of the data related to the holder

holderId.description: The unique internal ID of the holder

holder.description: Data for a single data holder

unauthenticated.description: Unauthenticated data for a single data holder

authenticated.description: Authenticated data for a single data holder

customers.description: An array of customers and their data

client.description: A previously registered client aligned to the current version of the data standards

recipient.description: A recipient record from the CDR Register aligned to the current version of the data standards

bankProduct.description: A bank product aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyPlan.description: An energy plan aligned to the current version of the data standards

adminStatus.description: A status object for the holder

adminOutage.description: A planned outage object for the holder

customerWrapper.description: A wrapper for a single customer to contain all of the data related to the customer

customerId.description: The unique internal ID of the customer

accounts.description: An array of accounts and their data

directDebits.description: An array of direct debit authorisations

accounts.description: An array of accounts and their data

servicePoints.description: An array of service points and their data

customer.description: A customer record aligned to the current version of the data standards

bankDirectDebit.description: A direct debit authorisation aligned to the current version of the data standards

bankPayee.description: A payee aligned to the current version of the data standards

bankPaymentSchedule.description: A payment schedule aligned to the current version of the data standards

bankAccountWrapper.description: A wrapper for a single bank account to contain all of the data related to the account

transactions.description: An array of transactions for the account

bankAccount.description: A bank account aligned to the current version of the data standards

bankAccountBalance.description: A balance for a bank account aligned to the current version of the data standards

bankTransaction.description: A bank transaction aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyAccountWrapper.description: A wrapper for a single eenrgy account to contain all of the data related to the account

paymentSchedule.description: An array of agreed payment schedules

invoices.description: An array of invoices for the account

transactions.description: An array of transactions for the account

concessions.description: An array of concessions for the account

energyAccount.description: An energy account aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyAccountBalance.description: An energy account balance structure aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyPaymentSchedule.description: An energy payment schedule structure aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyInvoice.description: An energy invoice aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyTransaction.description: An energy transaction aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyConcession.description: An energy concession aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyServicePointWrapper.description: An energy for a single service point (metering site) to contain all of the data related to the service point

usage.description: An array of reads for the service point

energyServicePoint.description: Standing data for an energy service point aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyDerData.description: Distributed energy resources for an energy account aligned to the current version of the data standards

energyUsageRead.description: A usage read for a service point aligned to the current version of the data standards
